tags.name: lorem-data
tags.description:
`lorem-data`
a threaded discussions component

### Styling

`<lorem-data>` provides the following custom properties
for styling:

Custom property | Description | Default
----------------|-------------|----------
`--lorem-data-FontSize` | default font-size | 14px

Attributes:

  * `schemas` - 

  * `__demo` - 

Properties:

  * `data` - 

  * `schemas` - 

  * `__demo` - 

  * `colors` {`any[]`} - colors from Simple Colors

  * `icons` {`(string | null)[]`} - 

  * `text` {`string`} - 

  * `words` {`string[]`} -
